properties.verseOrder: v1 p c v2 p c b c

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There were walls between us And by the cross you came and broke them down You broke them down
And there were chains around us By Your grace we are no longer bound No longer bound

verse.name: p
verse.lines: You called me out of the grave You called me into the light You called my name and then my heart came alive

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Your love is greater Your love is stronger Your love awakens, awakens, awakens me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Feel the darkness shaking All the dead are coming back to life Back to life
Hear the song awaken All creation singing we're alive 'Cause You're alive

verse.name: b
verse.lines: And what a love we found Death can't hold us down We shout it out we're alive, 'cause you're alive
